text: Need some inspiration to deepen your descriptions for the design challenge?

Method and Operation

The specific details about the solution are discussed rather than leaving ideas at a conceptual level. How exactly will the device or process function and more importantly, how will it accomplish its overall goal?

What conditions need to exist for the product or process to operate the way it was intended? Is it operated manually, remotely, or with the aid of the external environment? For instance, a grow toy will only grow if it is placed in water or some other liquid. On the other hand, a solar panel won't collect energy unless there is light.
